title: PLEASE PLEASE..PLEASE.. NERF ZED!
body:
PLEASE FOR GODS SAKE, lets take a look...

So I'm just running around river headed to mid from bot lane, and I see this little black figure sitting in the river bush, so I approach it curious of what it could be..... 

So I walk into the bush, introduce myself (Twitch), and wtf next thing i know, dude spinning slaps my nostrils off, then has the nerve to throw a shuriken into my chest, so I snarl at him and try to walk away, but as I turn away from him theres, standing in front of me BAM him again, so I turn around to double check and BAM there he is, now there is two of this dude,

Needless to say my mind is blown, that there could be two of the same person, but sure enough there was,, now on both sides of me.... then bam, dude comes flying out of the sky looking like the same person but in full color...

TLDR; its not fair that you can get 3v1'd in a 1v1.

please nerf this champion!{{champion:238}} {{item:3070}}
